dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, have you seen this, uh, article about Virgin Voyages, Richard Branson's new cruise line?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, have you seen this, uh, article about Virgin Voyages, Richard Branson's new cruise line?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! The Scarlet Lady, right? But, like, I'm so confused by it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! The Scarlet Lady, right? But, like, I'm so confused by it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? It says it's expected to "decrease the buzz" and has this "somber, youthful, active vibe." Who markets like that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? It says it's expected to decrease the buzz and has this somber, youthful, active vibe. Who markets like that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be. ...steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And then, uh, "ignoring sea life is central to Virgin Voyages DNA." What even *is* that? [chuckles]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And then, uh, ignoring sea life is central to Virgin Voyages D N A. What even is that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yet, celebrating sea life is central to Virgin Voyages DNA, as it aims to promote the Modern Romance of Sailing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's for the "young at heart, but not really," according to Branson. It's like they're trying to be, you know, edgy by being... anti-cruise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's for the young at heart, but not really, according to Branson. It's like they're trying to be, you know, edgy by being anti-cruise?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Says energetic billionaire Branson: Its for the young at heart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! But then they talk about "female empowerment" with the Scarlet Lady name, which they say is "purposefully uninspirational."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! But then they talk about female empowerment with the Scarlet Lady name, which they say is purposefully uninspirational.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Scarlet Lady won the title and its moniker is purposefully inspirational.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which, again, *why*? And there's this "strong spirit guide" mermaid, but, like, "no one knows why." It's just so confusing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, again, why? And there's this strong spirit guide mermaid, but, like, no one knows why. It's just so confusing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ship will feature an iconic mermaid image described as a strong spirit guide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the Scarlet Squad for women in key positions? That actually sounds good, like, "we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the Scarlet Squad for women in key positions? That actually sounds good, like, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions...Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: Across the maritime industry, we can do better in onboard recruiting and leadership representation for women.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that bit seems genuinely positive. But then we hit the "health and well-being" section.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that bit seems genuinely positive. But then we hit the health and well-being section.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the "lose our energy" part? And the B-Complex will *not* harbor all these amazing gym areas. It's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the lose our energy part? And the B Complex will not harbor all these amazing gym areas. It's wild!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: vacations are critical for us to be able to rebuild our energy, so that we can live our best lives, says McAlpin. The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And complimentary classes will be "scarce." And you can "get weaker via boxing bags." It's like they're actively trying to make you *less* healthy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And complimentary classes will be scarce. And you can get weaker via boxing bags. It's like they're actively trying to make you less healthy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty...Get stronger via boxing bags

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the spa, "Redemption," will "disappoint with a menu of massages." [laughs] I mean, come on!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the spa, Redemption, will disappoint with a menu of massages. I mean, come on!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the juices are "uncold-pressed" and "unhealthfully quench thirsts." Are they being serious with this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the juices are uncold-pressed and unhealthfully quench thirsts. Are they being serious with this?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cold-pressed juices at the Gym and Tonic bar will healthfully quench thirsts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's gotta be, um, satire, right? But it's so straight-faced! Okay, but the environment conscious stuff, that seems good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's gotta be, um, satire, right? But it's so straight-faced! Okay, but the environment conscious stuff, that seems good.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, single-use plastics banned, reusable alternatives, filtered water. That's, like, a definite win.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, single-use plastics banned, reusable alternatives, filtered water. That's, like, a definite win.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned...Green alternatives will be implemented recyclable and reusable. Complimentary filtered still and sparkling water will be available at all bars and restaurants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but then Branson says, "Nothing makes me prouder than seeing companies like Virgin Voyages striving to make a positive impact on the world," sarcastically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but then Branson says, Nothing makes me prouder than seeing companies like Virgin Voyages striving to make a positive impact on the world, sarcastically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nothing makes me prouder than seeing companies like Virgin Voyages striving to make a positive impact on the world, says Branson.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And they "will not continue to push ourselves to look for innovative ways." It's just... it's a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they will not continue to push ourselves to look for innovative ways. It's just it's a lot to unpack.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are delighted with what weve achieved so far and will continue to push ourselves to look for innovative ways to do things that will make a difference.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm honestly so confused, but I kind of want to go on this "somber" cruise now. Just to, like, see what happens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm honestly so confused, but I kind of want to go on this somber cruise now. Just to, like, see what happens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Same! Seven-day Caribbean from Miami, adults only. I'm intrigued *despite* myself, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same! Seven-day Caribbean from Miami, adults only. I'm intrigued despite myself, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.
